description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. This game is local-multiplayer ONLY!  An IndieCade 2012 Finalist, Hidden in Plain Sight is a tense game of subtlety and intrigue... try out what some are calling the best local multiplayer game to hit the Xbox Indie platform!
description.short: This game is local-multiplayer ONLY!  An IndieCade 2012 Finalist, Hidden in Plain Sight is a tense game of subtlety and intrigue... try out what some are calling the best local multiplayer game to hit the Xbox Indie platform!
